# pd-timeline-date

## Usage

```html
<pd-timeline-date date="10.10.2020" header="header" href="http://www.lambda-it.ch" target="_blank">
    content
</pd-timeline-date>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description          | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `date`   | `date`    | Timeline date        | `string` | `''`        |
| `header` | `header`  | Header text          | `string` | `undefined` |
| `href`   | `href`    | Header link location | `string` | `undefined` |
| `target` | `target`  | Header link target   | `string` | `'_blank'`  |


## Slots

| Slot | Description           |
| ---- | --------------------- |
|      | timeline item content |
